name: Marinated chicken thigh Filet with tortelloni
instructions: Combine brown sugar, ketchup, salt, pepper, and basil to create the marinade.
Coat the chicken thigh fillets in the marinade and let sit for at least 15 minutes.
Cook the chicken in a pan over medium to high heat until fully cooked and caramelized.
Cook tortellini according to package instructions and serve on the side.
